nodes.text: A rhydonium refinery was located on the world of Morak. It was operated by an Imperial remnant led by ex-Imperial Security Bureau personnel. In approximately 9 ABY the refinery was infiltrated by Din Djarin and Migs Mayfeld posing as Juggernaut Pilots to retrieve information on Moff Gideon's light cruiser. During their escape, Mayfeld fired on a shipment of rhydonium, causing a chain reaction that heavily damaged the refinery.
